actions.committee: House Committee on Public Works and Transportation
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Public Works and Transportation.

official_title: A bill to amend the Flood Control Act of 1962 (Public Law 87-874) by authorizing the Secretary of the Army acting through the Chief of Engineers to design, construct, and provide treatment facilities and a regional conveyance system of water from Kaw Lake.
short_title: Kaw Reservoir Water Conveyance Authorization Act

summary.text: Kaw Reservoir Water Conveyance Authorization Act - Directs the Secretary of the Army, acting through the Chief of Engineers, to construct treatment facilities and a regional conveyance system of water from Kaw Lake for non-Federal public members of the Kaw Reservoir Authority, Oklahoma.

titles.title: Kaw Reservoir Water Conveyance Authorization Act

A bill to amend the Flood Control Act of 1962 (Public Law 87-874) by authorizing the Secretary of the Army acting through the Chief of Engineers to design, construct, and provide treatment facilities and a regional conveyance system of water from Kaw Lake.
